properties.description:
Carrizo Plain

Carrizo Plain National Monument is a nature preserve in Santa Margarita bordering grasslands, mountains, and a salt lake.

Source: Field Mag.

Big Basin

Big Basin Redwoods State Park experienced a massive wildfire in 2020. After total destruction comes opportunity - this area now blooms with fire-following wildflower species.

Source: Washington Post.

Antelope Valley

Antelope Valley California Poppy Reserve is one of the most famous destinations for wildflower-viewing each spring, especially well-known for its intense displays of California's state flower - the California poppy.

Source: California Parks and Recreation.

Cuyama

Cuyama, a tiny Californian town, comes alive with visitors during superblooms as nearby hillsides become covered with carpets of wildflowers.

Source: The Atlantic.

Corona

Wildflower-viewing opportunities abound just outside this major Californian city. Some viewers even opt to zipline through the landscape.

Source: The Atlantic.

Joshua Tree

Joshua Tree National Park releases weekly reports on wildflower conditions throughout the spring viewable on their website.

Source: National Park Service.

Lake Elsinore

This small city is one of the most popular destinations for California poppy viewing, experiencing an influx of thousands of tourists each year.

Source: New York Times.
